title: Failure when getting bugs last change time
body:
```
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259010+00:00 app[web.1]: ERROR:http_service.app:Exception on /component/predict/batch [POST]
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259026+00:00 app[web.1]: Traceback (most recent call last):
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259029+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2446, in wsgi_app
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259031+00:00 app[web.1]:     response = self.full_dispatch_request()
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259034+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1951, in full_dispatch_request
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259036+00:00 app[web.1]:     rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259038+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1820, in handle_user_exception
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259041+00:00 app[web.1]:     reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259043+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/_compat.py", line 39, in reraise
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259045+00:00 app[web.1]:     raise value
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259047+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1949, in full_dispatch_request
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259050+00:00 app[web.1]:     rv = self.dispatch_request()
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259052+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1935, in dispatch_request
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259054+00:00 app[web.1]:     return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259057+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask_cors/decorator.py", line 128, in wrapped_function
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259059+00:00 app[web.1]:     resp = make_response(f(*args, **kwargs))
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259061+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/code/http_service/app.py", line 388, in batch_prediction
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259063+00:00 app[web.1]:     bug_change_dates = get_bugs_last_change_time(bugs)
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259065+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/code/http_service/app.py", line 144, in get_bugs_last_change_time
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259068+00:00 app[web.1]:     raw_bugs = response.json()
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259070+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/requests/models.py", line 897, in json
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259072+00:00 app[web.1]:     return complexjson.loads(self.text, **kwargs)
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259074+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/json/__init__.py", line 348, in loads
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259076+00:00 app[web.1]:     return _default_decoder.decode(s)
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259078+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/json/decoder.py", line 337, in decode
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259080+00:00 app[web.1]:     obj, end = self.raw_decode(s, idx=_w(s, 0).end())
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259082+00:00 app[web.1]:   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/json/decoder.py", line 355, in raw_decode
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259085+00:00 app[web.1]:     raise JSONDecodeError("Expecting value", s, err.value) from None
2019-07-26T22:38:19.259086+00:00 app[web.1]: json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)
```
